d6cd88d8-b4e5-4453-a4d4-64acdd2801fc.description: This course gives learners a high-level overview of the basics of a OneStream application. Learners complete lessons, activities, and assessments that enable them to recognize the fundamental elements of creating a OneStream application. Earners of this badge have demonstrated the ability to recognize the significance of a OneStream application, identify User roles, and interpret Metadata, common business processes, Cubes, Workflows, and the different reporting options available in OneStream.
d6cd88d8-b4e5-4453-a4d4-64acdd2801fc.name: OneStream Essentials: Getting Started With OneStream

badge_template_activities.title: Learners have passed each individual End of Lesson Assessment with a score of 70% or higher.

384d0073-a993-4119-b2a4-dbe1e0848faf.description: The OneStream Architecture: Designing an Application course will provide learners with access to Metadata, Workflow, and Rules design related courses. Using a variety of interactive tools, learners will navigate through a series of lessons and activities that will enable them to comprehend the key elements of a Project Design Phase. Earners of this badge have demonstrated they possess the foundational knowledge to analyze customer requirements and initiate the design of a OneStream application.
384d0073-a993-4119-b2a4-dbe1e0848faf.name: OneStream Architecture: Designing an Application

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must pass each assessment in the OneStream Architect: Designing an Application course with a score of 70% or higher.

5c89aa83-bb11-45c7-88a6-dc0ca05a0b4f.description: The earners of this micro-credential have demonstrated that they posses an understanding of the phases of a typical OneStream Implementation, how to build a Dimension Library, setting up Cubes & Extensibility, designing and creating Workflows for Data Entry, and running basic calculations.
5c89aa83-bb11-45c7-88a6-dc0ca05a0b4f.name: OneStream Essentials: Implementing OneStream

badge_template_activities.title: Learners have completed all labs included in the OneStream Essentials: Implementing OneStream course.
Learners have completed the on-demand lab exercises.

2e049859-b3db-4636-9588-995a919ceb19.description: The earners of this badge have demonstrated they possess the necessary skills and knowledge required to create effective reporting tools in OneStream. Competencies include: recommending reporting tools to a target audience based on metadata, developing performant Cube Views, working with Report Books, using Spreadsheet for Quick Views, making the most of the Member Filter Builder, using Parameters, and bringing basic calculations into reports.
2e049859-b3db-4636-9588-995a919ceb19.name: OneStream Essentials: Building Basic Reports

badge_template_activities.title: Learners have completed the on-demand lab exercises.
Learners have passed each individual End of Lesson Assessment with a score of 70% or higher.

286559c8-dda2-441a-be9d-e73bc6dbc8f6.description: Earners of the OneStream Certified Professional (OCP) - Lead Architect digital credential possess recommended experience in areas of Accounting, Finance, and Information Technology. This includes 2-3 years of real-world experience, 1+ years working with the OneStream software itself, and the implementation of multiple live projects. OneStream Certified candidates demonstrate the highest levels of technical competency and productivity, earning them industry recognition.
286559c8-dda2-441a-be9d-e73bc6dbc8f6.name: OneStream Certified Professional (OCP) - Lead Architect R1

badge_template_activities.title: It is recommended that candidates possess 2-3 years of experience in the field. Additionally, candidates should have 1+ years experience working with OneStream and have multiple projects completed and live.
It is recommended that candidates complete the OneStream Architecture: Designing an Application course.
It is recommended that candidates complete the OneStream Level 2 Financial Model Rules course.
It is recommended that candidates complete the OneStream Level 2 Reporting course.
It is recommended that candidates complete the OneStream Essentials: Implementing OneStream course.
Candidates must read and agree to the OneStream Certification Program Terms and Conditions and Non-Disclosure Agreement.
Successfully complete the OneStream Lead Architect R1 exam.

e90acb96-60ab-493d-9380-e30bfe0d5fb0.description: Earners of the OneStream Certified Associate (OCA) in Administration digital credential have the knowledge, skill, and experience to build, maintain and adjust various facets of OneStream’s unified financial platform. This includes at least 1 year of real-world experience working with the OneStream software in a support or enablement role. OneStream Certified candidates demonstrate the highest levels of technical competency and productivity, earning them industry recognition.
e90acb96-60ab-493d-9380-e30bfe0d5fb0.name: OneStream Certified Associate (OCA) in Administration

badge_template_activities.title: It is recommended that earner has: 1) Aided in a OneStream Application’s implementation or 1+ year of Administrator experience 2) 1+ year working with OneStream Software in a support or enablement role 3) Has experience/knowledge in areas of Accounting/Finance and/or Information Technology.
It is recommended that candidates complete the OneStream Application Build for Administrators course.
Candidates must read and agree to the OneStream Certification Program Terms and Conditions and Non-Disclosure Agreement.
Successfully complete the OneStream Certified Associate in Administration R1 exam.

095b94ad-e08c-463c-95cf-3741c664acf9.description: Earners of this badge are Sensible Machine Learning implementers who have completed approximately 7 hours of training using a variety of interactive tools. They have demonstrated the foundational knowledge to analyze customer requirements and implement Sensible Machine Learning (ML). Participants have learned to build models in Sensible ML, utilize models and forecasts, consume Sensible ML forecasts, and refit and rebuild models.
095b94ad-e08c-463c-95cf-3741c664acf9.name: OneStream MarketPlace: Implementing Sensible Machine Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must successfully complete the assessment associated with the OneStream MarketPlace: Implementing Sensible Machine Learning course with a score of 70% or higher.

c83cb00d-d78d-49fd-b638-696143466406.description: Earners of this badge will have demonstrated they possess the ability to create users and groups, configure security groups, distinguish between System Roles and Application Roles, configure Application security, assign Workflow security, create XML load files using the Security Template, and define slice security.
c83cb00d-d78d-49fd-b638-696143466406.name: OneStream Essentials: Configuring Core Application Security

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must successfully complete the assessment associated with the OneStream Essentials: Configuring Core Application Security with a score of 70% or higher.

2112a6de-8ad9-4da5-a930-1b01e8a34423.description: Earners of this badge have directly contributed to OneStream Press via authorship of a textbook. This badge signifies profound knowledge specific to an authored textbook, as well as the determination and hard work required to take a book from concept to completion. This badge is only awarded upon the successful publication of a textbook.
2112a6de-8ad9-4da5-a930-1b01e8a34423.name: OneStream Press Author

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have written content and directly contributed to the OneStream Press.

429345ba-ac66-4957-aa27-60026150d9a3.description: Earners of this badge demonstrate expert knowledge of the OneStream tool and have greatly contributed to the OneStream Certification Program. The overall dedication of the SME's time and expertise throughout the exam development process results in relevant and reliable OneStream certification exams, and facilitates a robust community of OneStream implementers.
429345ba-ac66-4957-aa27-60026150d9a3.name: OneStream Certification Exam Subject Matter Expert (SME)

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge possess in-depth knowledge of the OneStream tool and participated in every stage of the exam development process, including Job Task Analysis (JTA), Item Writing and Technical Reviews.

8ab0cdc3-37b5-43bd-80c1-bbe428520b6f.description: The earners of this badge have demonstrated they possess the ability to configure Sensible ML and AI Services Utilities, along with the critical thinking skillset required to execute the Model Build milestone for Sensible ML customer engagements.
8ab0cdc3-37b5-43bd-80c1-bbe428520b6f.name: Sensible Machine Learning Model Builder

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Sensible ML Consulting Bootcamp with a clear understanding of the Sensible ML solution and AI Services Utilities and how to execute a successful Model Build phase of an implementation.

As a Sensible ML Model Builder, you must leverage AIS Data Manipulator, Sensible ML, AIS XperiFlow Data Tools, and the Forecast Value Add Dashboard to successfully demonstrate the following in comparison to a customer's benchmark forecast over the specified backtest period, in order to demonstrate: 1) An overall accuracy improvement and 2) Consistent accuracy across 5 forecast versions.

f1e8d69e-430d-4c1b-90c2-1164032a51ec.description: Earners of this internal OneStream micro-credential demonstrate expert knowledge in the technical and functional skills necessary to lead a targeted application review OneStream project. The ability to properly diagnose, troubleshoot and optimize processes and performance in a OneStream application results in highly performant OneStream applications and an excellent overall end user experience for the OneStream community user group. This micro-credential is only available to OneStream employees.
f1e8d69e-430d-4c1b-90c2-1164032a51ec.name: Advanced Application Solutions (AAS) Targeted Application Review Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge possess in depth knowledge of the skills necessary to lead a targeted application review project and will have worked on at least two application reviews projects at OneStream, completed the AAS application review learning path, and passed the AAS Targeted Application Review Assessment.
Completed the Targeted Application Review Learning Path.
Passed the assessment associated with the Targeted Application Review Learning Path with a score of 76% or higher.
Submitted AAS Targeted Application Review project experience

skills.name: AAS Targeted Application Review Project Methodology

cf2ae83e-87e0-44cf-9d64-8025a425ce29.description: The Design Learning Path will provide learners with access to Metadata, Workflow, and Rules design related courses. Using a variety of interactive tools, learners will navigate through a series of lessons and activities that will enable them to comprehend the key elements of a Project Design Phase. Earners of this badge have demonstrated they possess the foundational knowledge to analyze customer requirements and initiate the design of a OneStream application.
cf2ae83e-87e0-44cf-9d64-8025a425ce29.name: OneStream Architect Design Learning Path

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must successfully complete each of the assessments associated with the Design Learning Path, including the final overall assessment.
Assessment: Data Unit
Assessment: Entity Dimension
Assessment: Extensibility
Assessment: Analytic Blend
Assessment: Cube Properties
Assessment: Workflow Design
Assessment: Workflow Data Unit
Assessment: Workflow Data Collection
Assessment: Processing Financial Calculations
Final Comprehensive Assessment
